items.text: Substitute in for a senior developer halfway through a web development project

Developing meaningful relationships with colleagues and clients

employers.description: At the end of my working holiday Visa in Ireland, I spent 4 months exploring areas of Europe that I had not yet had the chance to. I travelled with my partner through the Balkans, Eastern Europe, Mediterranean Islands and Latin Europe with a quick stop in Morocco, experiencing a wide variety of cultures, histories and natural beauty along the way. This was a wonderful opportunity to learn more about the world and myself that I will never forget.

items.text: Organise transport & accomodation for an international trip for 2 - 8 people
Explored and experienced 15 countries' history and culture on a tight budget

employers.description: After my Visa ended in the UK I moved to Dublin, where I worked in temporary positions for various recruitment agencies such as Reed, Hays, Hall, Excel and CPL. I assisted various companies and individuals in a multitude of ways, from support administration for an Anti-Money Laundering and Anti-Terrorist Financing team (6 Months) to acting as a personal assistant for an Artist (2 Weeks).

items.text: Assist individuals and teams navigating technical processes and software

Perform various checks to ensure validity of legal agreements with customers, including signature screenings
Receptionist duties - assist customers and company partners with general queries and designate specialty queries to the correct department, via phone or email
